Files.Description: Remote Tools for Visual Studio 2015 RC (ARM) - (Korean)
Files.Notes:
The Remote Tools are intended for computers that don't have Visual Studio so that you can debug, test, and profile apps that are executing on them. Visual Studio must be installed on the development computer that's connected to, or uses the data collected from, the remote computer. Connecting to the remote debugger and profiler that are included in the Remote Tools for Visual Studio 2015 RC is supported in Visual Studio Ultimate 2015 RC.

To find out what's new in Visual Studio 2015 RC, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC KB Article.

Files.Description: Visual Studio Enterprise 2015 RC (x86) - DVD (Korean)
Files.Notes:
Visual Studio Enterprise 2015 RC is an integrated, end-to-end solution for teams of any size with demanding quality and scale needs that require comprehensive tools and services for defining, building and managing complex enterprise applications and solutions targeting Microsoft’s full Enterprise platform as well as cross-platform technologies.

To find out what's new in Visual Studio 2015 RC, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC KB Article.

Files.Description: Visual Studio 2015 RC Shell (Isolated) Redistributable Package (x86) - (German)
Files.Notes:
The Visual Studio 2015 RC Shell (Isolated) provides a foundation on which you can build your own custom-branded tools environment that runs side-by-side with Visual Studio. By building on the Visual Studio 2015 RC Shell (Isolated), you can reuse the Visual Studio IDE in your application so that you can just focus on the development of your own core tooling.

This download contains redistributable run-time binaries that you can distribute together with your Visual Studio 2015 RC Shell (Isolated)-based application. These binaries are required on all computers that must run the Visual Studio 2015 RC Shell (Isolated).

To find out what's new in Visual Studio 2015 RC, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC KB Article.

Files.Description: Agents for Visual Studio 2015 Preview (x86) - (Chinese-Simplified)
Files.Notes:
By using the test agents in Agents for Visual Studio 2015 Preview, you can scale out load generation, and support distributed data collection and distributed test execution. You can also use test agents to manage testing and workflow for virtual machines or physical machines.

To find out what's new in Visual Studio 2015, see the Visual Studio 2015 Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Visual Studio 2015 KB Article.

Files.Description: Visual Studio Express 2015 RC for Windows 10 (x86) - Web Installer (Spanish)
Files.Notes:
You can use Visual Studio Express 2015 RC for Windows 10 to create innovative and compelling Windows universal apps. The tools include a full-featured code editor, a powerful debugger, a focused profiler, and rich language support for HTML5/JavaScript, C++, C#, or Visual Basic so you can use the language you are most comfortable with. Visual Studio Express 2015 RC for Windows also allows you to download a device emulator that you can use to test your apps on multiple kinds of devices without the physical hardware.

To find out what's new in Visual Studio 2015 RC, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC KB Article.

Files.Description: Feedback Client for Visual Studio Team Foundation Server 2015 RC (x86) - (Chinese-Traditional)
Files.Notes:
By working with your stakeholders to install the Feedback Client for TFS on their computers, you can collect feedback about your software projects. You can request feedback from stakeholders, or they can provide rich feedback—for example, screenshots, audio, video, and attachments—that's tightly integrated into Visual Studio Team Foundation Server and Visual Studio Online.

To find out what's new in Visual Studio 2015 RC, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC KB Article.

Files.Description: Visual Studio Express 2015 RC for Web (x86) - Web Installer (German)
Files.Notes:
Visual Studio Express for Web has the tools to create standards-based, responsive websites, web APIs, or real-time online experiences using ASP.NET. Take advantage of the full-featured markup and code editors, design-time tooling, rich language support, and other tools when creating your solution. Publish your web application directly to Microsoft Azure from the IDE. Create web services consumed by connected devices.

To find out what's new in Visual Studio 2015 RC, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC KB Article.

Files.Description: Visual Studio Team Foundation Server Extensions for Project Server 2015 RC (x86 and x64) - DVD (English)
Files.Notes:
NOTE: This download is a trial version that will expire in 90 days. No product key is available. To extend the trial, go to "Team Foundation Server Admin Console", select the top node in the navigation tree, and click "Extend Trial Preiod".
We recommend you replace this with Team Foundation Server 2015 RTM when it is available.

Visual Studio Team Foundation Server Extensions for Project Server 2015 RC enables integration between Visual Studio Team Foundation Server 2015 RC and Project Server 2013. These extensions are similar to the SharePoint Extensions for Team Foundation Server 2013 and need to be installed on all of the front end servers in your SharePoint farm that is supporting Project Server 2013. Visual Studio Team Foundation Server Extensions for Project Server 2015 RC enable teams to create Enterprise Project Plans in Project Server 2013 and syncing data between it and Team Projects in Team Foundation Server 2015 RC.

To find out what's new in Team Foundation Server 2015 RC, see the Team Foundation Server 2015 RC Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Team Foundation Server 2015 RC KB Article.

Files.Description: Visual C++ Redistributable for Visual Studio 2015 RC (x86) - (Italian)
Files.Notes:
The Visual C++ Redistributable Packages install run-time components of Visual C++ libraries that are required to run applications that are developed by using Visual Studio 2015 RC on a computer that does not have Visual Studio 2015 RC installed. These packages install run-time components of these libraries: C Runtime (CRT), Standard C++, MFC, C++ AMP, and OpenMP.

To find out what's new in Visual Studio 2015 RC, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC KB Article.

Files.Description: Visual Studio Community 2015 RC (x86) - DVD (Korean)
Files.Notes:
Visual Studio Community 2015 RC is a free, full-featured IDE with powerful coding productivity features, cross-platform mobile development tools for Windows, iOS and Android, and access to thousands of extensions. This edition of Visual Studio is available at no cost for non-enterprise application development. After installation, check out the Visual Studio Gallery. It provides quick access to tools, controls, and templates to help you get the most out of Visual Studio.

To find out what's new in Visual Studio 2015 RC, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC KB Article.

Files.Description: .NET Framework 4.6 RC Language Pack (x86 and x64) - (French)
Files.Notes: The .NET Framework 4.6 RC Language Pack contains translated error messages and other UI text for languages other than English. If you don't install a language pack, this text is displayed in English. You can install multiple language packs on one computer, each for a different language. You need to download and install the .NET Framework 4.6 RC (offline installer) prior to installing the language packs. You can find the .NET Framework 4.6 RC (offline installer) here.

Files.Description: Visual Studio 2015 RC Shell (Integrated) Redistributable Package (x86) - (Italian)
Files.Notes:
Visual Studio 2015 RC Shell (Integrated) provides the foundation on which you can seamlessly integrate tools and programming languages in Visual Studio. Because it doesn't contain any programming languages, it's the perfect way to deploy a development environment for your own language. Visual Studio 2015 RC Shell (Integrated) integrates with Visual Studio Professional 2015 RC, Visual Studio Premium 2015 RC, and Visual Studio Ultimate 2015 RC. Any tools and programming languages that run in Visual Studio 2015 RC Shell (Integrated) will run together with Visual Studio if they are installed on the same machine. By using Visual Studio 2015 RC Shell (Integrated), you don't have to make Visual Studio a prerequisite on the machines you deploy to.

To find out what's new in Visual Studio 2015 RC, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC KB Article

Files.Description: Visual Studio Test Professional 2015 RC (x86) - Web Installer (Spanish)
Files.Notes:
Visual Studio Test Professional 2015 RC is ideal for testers, business analysts, product managers, and other stakeholders who need team collaboration tools but not a full development IDE. Visual Studio Test Professional 2015 RC supports lightweight requirements definition and continuous customer feedback, and also provides traceability across these processes.

Files.Description: Release Management Server for Team Foundation Server 2015 RC (x64) - Web Installer (Korean)
Files.Notes:
Release Management for Visual Studio 2015 RC supports you to configure, approve and deploy your applications for any environment. Create automated deployment orchestrations for each environment no matter how complex the configuration. Delivering your software more frequently and easily to an environment allows your testers to get to work validating your system and keeps your stakeholders involved in giving feedback.

Release Management for Visual Studio 2015 RC requires Visual Studio Enterprise 2015 RC or Test Professional 2015 RC. For licensing requirements refer to Visual Studio and MSDN Licensing White Paper.

Note: To enable the release management capabilities, you must also install the Release Management Server for Team Foundation Server 2015 RC. To model release processes and enable graphical views of release status, you must have the Release Management Client for Visual Studio 2015. For agent-based releases, on every target machine to which you want to publish deployments, you must install Microsoft Deployment Agent 2013. For vNext Releases, you don’t need to install Microsoft Deployment Agent on the target machine.

To find out what's new in Visual Studio 2015 RC, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC KB Article.

Files.Description: Release Management Server for Team Foundation Server 2015 RC (x64) - Web Installer (Russian)

Release Management for Visual Studio 2015 RC requires Visual Studio Enterprise 2015 RC or Test Professional 2015 RC. For licensing requirements refer to Visual Studio and MSDN Licensing White Paper.

Note: To enable the release management capabilities, you must also install the Release Management Server for Team Foundation Server 2015 RC. For vNext Releases, you don’t need to install Microsoft Deployment Agent on the target machine.

These packages install run-time components of these libraries: C Runtime (CRT), Standard C++, MFC, C++ AMP, and OpenMP.

To find out what's new in Visual Studio 2015 RC, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC KB Article.

Files.Description: Visual Studio 2015 RC Shell (Integrated) Redistributable Package (x86) - (Japanese)
Files.Notes:
Visual Studio 2015 RC Shell (Integrated) provides the foundation on which you can seamlessly integrate tools and programming languages in Visual Studio. Because it doesn't contain any programming languages, it's the perfect way to deploy a development environment for your own language. Visual Studio 2015 RC Shell (Integrated) integrates with Visual Studio Professional 2015 RC, Visual Studio Premium 2015 RC, and Visual Studio Ultimate 2015 RC. Any tools and programming languages that run in Visual Studio 2015 RC Shell (Integrated) will run together with Visual Studio if they are installed on the same machine. By using Visual Studio 2015 RC Shell (Integrated), you don't have to make Visual Studio a prerequisite on the machines you deploy to.

To find out what's new in Visual Studio 2015 RC, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC KB Article

Files.Notes:
The Visual Studio 2015 RC Shell (Integrated) Language Pack enables the display of some of the user interface in different languages. After the Language Pack is installed, the user can switch among the languages. Visual Studio 2015 RC Shell (Integrated) must be installed before the Language Pack can be installed.

To find out what's new in Visual Studio 2015 RC, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC KB Article.

Files.Description: Visual Studio Team Foundation Server Extensions for Project Server 2015 RC (x86 and x64) - DVD (Chinese-Traditional)
Files.Notes:
NOTE: This download is a trial version that will expire in 90 days. No product key is available. To extend the trial, go to "Team Foundation Server Admin Console", select the top node in the navigation tree, and click "Extend Trial Preiod".
We recommend you replace this with Team Foundation Server 2015 RTM when it is available.

Visual Studio Team Foundation Server Extensions for Project Server 2015 RC enables integration between Visual Studio Team Foundation Server 2015 RC and Project Server 2013. These extensions are similar to the SharePoint Extensions for Team Foundation Server 2013 and need to be installed on all of the front end servers in your SharePoint farm that is supporting Project Server 2013. Visual Studio Team Foundation Server Extensions for Project Server 2015 RC enable teams to create Enterprise Project Plans in Project Server 2013 and syncing data between it and Team Projects in Team Foundation Server 2015 RC.

To find out what's new in Team Foundation Server 2015 RC, see the Team Foundation Server 2015 RC Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Team Foundation Server 2015 RC KB Article.

Files.Description: Release Management Server for Team Foundation Server 2015 RC (x64) - Web Installer (English)
Files.Notes:
Release Management for Visual Studio 2015 RC supports you to configure, approve and deploy your applications for any environment. Create automated deployment orchestrations for each environment no matter how complex the configuration. Delivering your software more frequently and easily to an environment allows your testers to get to work validating your system and keeps your stakeholders involved in giving feedback.

Release Management for Visual Studio 2015 RC requires Visual Studio Enterprise 2015 RC or Test Professional 2015 RC. For licensing requirements refer to Visual Studio and MSDN Licensing White Paper.

Note: To enable the release management capabilities, you must also install the Release Management Server for Team Foundation Server 2015 RC. To model release processes and enable graphical views of release status, you must have the Release Management Client for Visual Studio 2015. For agent-based releases, on every target machine to which you want to publish deployments, you must install Microsoft Deployment Agent 2013. For vNext Releases, you don’t need to install Microsoft Deployment Agent on the target machine.

To find out what's new in Visual Studio 2015 RC, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC KB Article.

Files.Notes: This is a web installer. There are separate installers for web and offline installation. If you don't install a language pack, this text is displayed in English. You can install multiple language packs on one computer, each for a different language. You need to download and install the .NET Framework 4.6 RC (offline installer) prior to installing the language packs. You can find the .NET Framework 4.6 RC (offline installer) here.

Files.Description: Feedback Client for Visual Studio Team Foundation Server 2015 RC Language Pack (x86) - (Korean)
Files.Notes:
The Feedback Client for TFS Language Pack enables the display of the user interface in different languages. After you install the Language Pack, you can switch among the languages. Feedback Client for TFS must be installed before you can install the Language Pack.

To find out what's new in Visual Studio 2015 RC, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC KB Article.

Files.Description: Visual C++ Redistributable for Visual Studio 2015 RC (x64) - (English)
Files.Notes:
The Visual C++ Redistributable Packages install run-time components of Visual C++ libraries that are required to run applications that are developed by using Visual Studio 2015 RC on a computer that does not have Visual Studio 2015 RC installed. These packages install run-time components of these libraries: C Runtime (CRT), Standard C++, MFC, C++ AMP, and OpenMP.

To find out what's new in Visual Studio 2015 RC, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC KB Article.

Files.Description: Microsoft Deployment Agent 2015 RC (x86 and x64) - Web Installer (Japanese)
Files.Notes:
Release Management for Visual Studio 2015 RC supports you to configure, approve and deploy your applications for any environment. Create automated deployment orchestrations for each environment no matter how complex the configuration. Delivering your software more frequently and easily to an environment allows your testers to get to work validating your system and keeps your stakeholders involved in giving feedback.

Release Management for Visual Studio 2015 RC requires Visual Studio Enterprise 2015 RC or Test Professional 2015 RC. For licensing requirements refer to Visual Studio and MSDN Licensing White Paper.

Note: To enable the release management capabilities, you must also install the Release Management Server for Team Foundation Server 2015 RC. To model release processes and enable graphical views of release status, you must have the Release Management Client for Visual Studio 2015. For agent-based releases, on every target machine to which you want to publish deployments, you must install Microsoft Deployment Agent 2013. For vNext Releases, you don’t need to install Microsoft Deployment Agent on the target machine.

To find out what's new in Visual Studio 2015 RC, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC KB Article.

Files.Description: Visual Studio Express 2015 RC for Web (x86) - Web Installer (Chinese-Simplified)
Files.Notes:
Visual Studio Express for Web has the tools to create standards-based, responsive websites, web APIs, or real-time online experiences using ASP.NET. Take advantage of the full-featured markup and code editors, design-time tooling, rich language support, and other tools when creating your solution. Publish your web application directly to Microsoft Azure from the IDE. Create web services consumed by connected devices.

To find out what's new in Visual Studio 2015 RC, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC KB Article.

Files.Description: Visual Studio Test Professional 2015 RC (x86) - DVD (English)
Files.Notes:
Visual Studio Test Professional 2015 RC is ideal for testers, business analysts, product managers, and other stakeholders who need team collaboration tools but not a full development IDE. These team members can use integrated testing and product management tools that keep stakeholders involved resulting in higher quality across the development process. Visual Studio Test Professional 2015 RC supports lightweight requirements definition and continuous customer feedback, and also provides traceability across these processes.

To find out what's new in Visual Studio 2015 RC, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC KB Article.

Files.Description: Visual Studio Express 2015 RC for Windows Desktop (x86) - Web Installer (English)
Files.Notes:
Visual Studio Express for Windows Desktop lets you take full advantage of Windows with XAML designers, a productive IDE, and a variety of programming languages including C#, Visual Basic, and C++. Choose between Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF), Windows Forms, and Win32, to target the Windows desktop with the right technology for your application and your skills.

To find out what's new in Visual Studio 2015 RC, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC KB Article.

Files.Description: Modeling SDK for Visual Studio 2015 RC (x86) - (English)
Files.Notes:
The Modeling SDK for Visual Studio 2015 RC provides:
  • MSBuild tasks that enable the indexing of assemblies and PDB files as part of a build or on the command line. The code index is used by Code Map, but it can be used on its own as well.
  • Project templates that help developers create graphical or form-based (Windows Forms and WPF) designers for use in Visual Studio to view and modify models for a custom domain-specific language.
  • Project templates that help developers create extensions for the Architecture Tools in Visual Studio Ultimate 2015 RC.
  • MSBuild tasks that enable the generation of textual artifacts at build time for any use of T4.
  • Reference assemblies and IntelliSense documentation for the DSL Tools runtime, which is included in Visual Studio 2015.
  • A migration tool that helps DSL authors migrate designers from Visual Studio 2013 VsVmSdk SDK to work with Visual Studio 2015.
  • Header files that contain Command IDs for the graphical designers and the architecture tools (UML designers, Layer designer).
Before this SDK can be installed, the Visual Studio 2015 RC SDK (VSSDK) must be installed first.

To find out what's new in Visual Studio 2015 RC, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC KB Article.

Files.Description: Remote Tools for Visual Studio 2015 RC (ARM) - (French)
Files.Notes:
The Remote Tools are intended for computers that don't have Visual Studio so that you can debug, test, and profile apps that are executing on them. Visual Studio must be installed on the development computer that's connected to, or uses the data collected from, the remote computer. Connecting to the remote debugger and profiler that are included in the Remote Tools for Visual Studio 2015 RC is supported in Visual Studio Ultimate 2015 RC.

To find out what's new in Visual Studio 2015 RC, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC KB Article.

Files.Description: Visual Studio Professional 2015 RC (x86) - DVD (Japanese)
Files.Notes:
Visual Studio Professional 2015 RC supports you to create applications across devices and services, using a single solution with a consistent development experience. It has the tools you need to deliver apps, as well as mobile web apps across any device, web site, cloud service, and more.

To find out what's new in Visual Studio 2015 RC, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC KB Article.

Files.Description: Visual Studio 2015 RC Shell (Integrated) Redistributable Package (x86) - (Chinese-Traditional)
Files.Notes:
Visual Studio 2015 RC Shell (Integrated) provides the foundation on which you can seamlessly integrate tools and programming languages in Visual Studio. Because it doesn't contain any programming languages, it's the perfect way to deploy a development environment for your own language. Visual Studio 2015 RC Shell (Integrated) integrates with Visual Studio Professional 2015 RC, Visual Studio Premium 2015 RC, and Visual Studio Ultimate 2015 RC. Any tools and programming languages that run in Visual Studio 2015 RC Shell (Integrated) will run together with Visual Studio if they are installed on the same machine. By using Visual Studio 2015 RC Shell (Integrated), you don't have to make Visual Studio a prerequisite on the machines you deploy to.

To find out what's new in Visual Studio 2015 RC, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC KB Article

Files.Description: Agents for Visual Studio 2015 Preview (x86) - (Japanese)
Files.Notes:
By using the test agents in Agents for Visual Studio 2015 Preview, you can scale out load generation, and support distributed data collection and distributed test execution. You can also use test agents to manage testing and workflow for virtual machines or physical machines.

To find out what's new in Visual Studio 2015, see the Visual Studio 2015 Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Visual Studio 2015 KB Article.

Files.Description: Visual Studio Team Foundation Server Extensions for Project Server 2015 RC (x86 and x64) - DVD (German)
Files.Notes:
NOTE: This download is a trial version that will expire in 90 days. No product key is available. To extend the trial, go to "Team Foundation Server Admin Console", select the top node in the navigation tree, and click "Extend Trial Preiod".
We recommend you replace this with Team Foundation Server 2015 RTM when it is available.

Visual Studio Team Foundation Server Extensions for Project Server 2015 RC enables integration between Visual Studio Team Foundation Server 2015 RC and Project Server 2013. These extensions are similar to the SharePoint Extensions for Team Foundation Server 2013 and need to be installed on all of the front end servers in your SharePoint farm that is supporting Project Server 2013. Visual Studio Team Foundation Server Extensions for Project Server 2015 RC enable teams to create Enterprise Project Plans in Project Server 2013 and syncing data between it and Team Projects in Team Foundation Server 2015 RC.

To find out what's new in Team Foundation Server 2015 RC, see the Team Foundation Server 2015 RC Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Team Foundation Server 2015 RC KB Article.

Files.Description: Microsoft Deployment Agent 2015 RC (x86 and x64) - Web Installer (French)
Files.Notes:
Release Management for Visual Studio 2015 RC supports you to configure, approve and deploy your applications for any environment. Create automated deployment orchestrations for each environment no matter how complex the configuration. Delivering your software more frequently and easily to an environment allows your testers to get to work validating your system and keeps your stakeholders involved in giving feedback.

Release Management for Visual Studio 2015 RC requires Visual Studio Enterprise 2015 RC or Test Professional 2015 RC. For licensing requirements refer to Visual Studio and MSDN Licensing White Paper.

Note: To enable the release management capabilities, you must also install the Release Management Server for Team Foundation Server 2015 RC. To model release processes and enable graphical views of release status, you must have the Release Management Client for Visual Studio 2015. For agent-based releases, on every target machine to which you want to publish deployments, you must install Microsoft Deployment Agent 2013. For vNext Releases, you don’t need to install Microsoft Deployment Agent on the target machine.

Files.Description: Visual Studio 2015 RC Shell (Integrated) Redistributable Package (x86) - (Russian)
Files.Notes:
Visual Studio 2015 RC Shell (Integrated) provides the foundation on which you can seamlessly integrate tools and programming languages in Visual Studio. Because it doesn't contain any programming languages, it's the perfect way to deploy a development environment for your own language. Visual Studio 2015 RC Shell (Integrated) integrates with Visual Studio Professional 2015 RC, Visual Studio Premium 2015 RC, and Visual Studio Ultimate 2015 RC. Any tools and programming languages that run in Visual Studio 2015 RC Shell (Integrated) will run together with Visual Studio if they are installed on the same machine. By using Visual Studio 2015 RC Shell (Integrated), you don't have to make Visual Studio a prerequisite on the machines you deploy to.

Files.Description: Microsoft Deployment Agent 2015 RC (x86 and x64) - Web Installer (Chinese-Simplified)
Files.Notes:
Release Management for Visual Studio 2015 RC supports you to configure, approve and deploy your applications for any environment. Create automated deployment orchestrations for each environment no matter how complex the configuration. Delivering your software more frequently and easily to an environment allows your testers to get to work validating your system and keeps your stakeholders involved in giving feedback.

Release Management for Visual Studio 2015 RC requires Visual Studio Enterprise 2015 RC or Test Professional 2015 RC. For licensing requirements refer to Visual Studio and MSDN Licensing White Paper.

Note: To enable the release management capabilities, you must also install the Release Management Server for Team Foundation Server 2015 RC. To model release processes and enable graphical views of release status, you must have the Release Management Client for Visual Studio 2015. For agent-based releases, on every target machine to which you want to publish deployments, you must install Microsoft Deployment Agent 2013. For vNext Releases, you don’t need to install Microsoft Deployment Agent on the target machine.

To find out what's new in Visual Studio 2015 RC, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC KB Article.

Connecting to the remote debugger and profiler that are included in the Remote Tools for Visual Studio 2015 RC is supported in Visual Studio Ultimate 2015 RC.

Files.Description: Visual Studio Team Foundation Server Extensions for Project Server 2015 RC (x86 and x64) - DVD (Korean)
Files.Notes:
NOTE: This download is a trial version that will expire in 90 days. No product key is available. To extend the trial, go to "Team Foundation Server Admin Console", select the top node in the navigation tree, and click "Extend Trial Preiod".
We recommend you replace this with Team Foundation Server 2015 RTM when it is available.

Visual Studio Team Foundation Server Extensions for Project Server 2015 RC enables integration between Visual Studio Team Foundation Server 2015 RC and Project Server 2013. These extensions are similar to the SharePoint Extensions for Team Foundation Server 2013 and need to be installed on all of the front end servers in your SharePoint farm that is supporting Project Server 2013. Visual Studio Team Foundation Server Extensions for Project Server 2015 RC enable teams to create Enterprise Project Plans in Project Server 2013 and syncing data between it and Team Projects in Team Foundation Server 2015 RC.

To find out what's new in Team Foundation Server 2015 RC, see the Team Foundation Server 2015 RC Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Team Foundation Server 2015 RC KB Article.

Files.Description: Release Management Server for Team Foundation Server 2015 RC (x64) - Web Installer (Chinese-Simplified)
Files.Notes:
Release Management for Visual Studio 2015 RC supports you to configure, approve and deploy your applications for any environment. Create automated deployment orchestrations for each environment no matter how complex the configuration. Delivering your software more frequently and easily to an environment allows your testers to get to work validating your system and keeps your stakeholders involved in giving feedback.

Release Management for Visual Studio 2015 RC requires Visual Studio Enterprise 2015 RC or Test Professional 2015 RC. For licensing requirements refer to Visual Studio and MSDN Licensing White Paper.

Note: To enable the release management capabilities, you must also install the Release Management Server for Team Foundation Server 2015 RC. To model release processes and enable graphical views of release status, you must have the Release Management Client for Visual Studio 2015. For agent-based releases, on every target machine to which you want to publish deployments, you must install Microsoft Deployment Agent 2013. For vNext Releases, you don’t need to install Microsoft Deployment Agent on the target machine.
